@@ -41,8 +41,6 @@ ac_help="$ac_help

     library_path_setting="contains current directory"
@@ -612,7 +610,7 @@ fi

-echo "configure:616: checking GCC_EXEC_PREFIX variable" >&5

   [:\;]* | *[:\;] | *[:\;][:\;]* |  *[:\;]. | .[:\;]*| . | *[:\;].[:\;]* )
     gcc_exec_prefix_setting="contains current directory"
